languages.text: "Да брось вздыхать, старик. Фон Валанциус и Чорда никогда не дружили в десна. Рано или поздно кто-то бы да взял верх — все это понимали".
"Oh, quit your worrying, old man. Von Valancius and Chorda have always been gunning for each other. One was bound to gain the upper hand sooner or later — everyone understood that."
languages.original_text: "Да брось вздыхать, старик. Фон Валанциус и Чорда никогда не дружили в десна. Рано или поздно кто-то бы да взял верх — все это понимали".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, quit your worrying, old man. Von Valancius and Chorda have always been gunning for each other. One was bound to gain the upper hand sooner or later — everyone understood that."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, quit your worrying, old man. Von Valancius and Chorda have always been gunning for each other. One was bound to gain the upper hand sooner or later — everyone understood that."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “噢，别再担心了，老家伙。冯·瓦兰修斯王朝和库尔达王朝一直在互相角力，总有一方要占据上风，大家早就明白这一点了。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, quit your worrying, old man. Von Valancius and Chorda have always been gunning for each other. One was bound to gain the upper hand sooner or later — everyone understood that."

traits.locale_text: “噢，别再担心了，老家伙。冯·瓦兰修斯王朝和库尔达王朝一直在互相角力，总有一方要占据上风，大家早就明白这一点了。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Allons, vous faites pas autant de mouron, vieillard. Les von Valancius et les Chorda se sont toujours tirés dans les pattes. C'était qu'une question de temps avant que l'un prenne l'avantage sur l'autre, et tout le monde le sait. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, quit your worrying, old man. Von Valancius and Chorda have always been gunning for each other. One was bound to gain the upper hand sooner or later — everyone understood that."

traits.locale_text: « Allons, vous faites pas autant de mouron, vieillard. Les von Valancius et les Chorda se sont toujours tirés dans les pattes. C'était qu'une question de temps avant que l'un prenne l'avantage sur l'autre, et tout le monde le sait. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Deje de preocuparse, anciano. Las casas von Valancius y Chorda siempre han estado enfrentadas. Tarde o temprano, alguna tenía que ganar, y es algo que todo el mundo entiende».
languages.original_text: "Oh, quit your worrying, old man. Von Valancius and Chorda have always been gunning for each other. One was bound to gain the upper hand sooner or later — everyone understood that."

traits.locale_text: «Deje de preocuparse, anciano. Las casas von Valancius y Chorda siempre han estado enfrentadas. Tarde o temprano, alguna tenía que ganar, y es algo que todo el mundo entiende».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「まあ、心配しないで、おじいさん。フォン・ヴァランシウスとチョーダはずっと互いに撃ち合ってきた仲じゃない。遅かれ早かれ、どちらかが優勢に立ってたわ…誰もがわかってたことよ」
languages.original_text: "Oh, quit your worrying, old man. Von Valancius and Chorda have always been gunning for each other. One was bound to gain the upper hand sooner or later — everyone understood that."

traits.locale_text: 「まあ、心配しないで、おじいさん。フォン・ヴァランシウスとチョーダはずっと互いに撃ち合ってきた仲じゃない。遅かれ早かれ、どちらかが優勢に立ってたわ…誰もがわかってたことよ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ach, macht Euch nicht so viele Sorgen, alter Mann. Von Valancius und Chorda haben es schon immer aufeinander abgesehen. Es war abzusehen, dass einer von beiden früher oder später die Oberhand gewinnen würde. Das war allen bewusst."
languages.original_text: "Oh, quit your worrying, old man. Von Valancius and Chorda have always been gunning for each other. One was bound to gain the upper hand sooner or later — everyone understood that."

traits.locale_text: "Ach, macht Euch nicht so viele Sorgen, alter Mann. Von Valancius und Chorda haben es schon immer aufeinander abgesehen. Es war abzusehen, dass einer von beiden früher oder später die Oberhand gewinnen würde. Das war allen bewusst."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Oh, quit your worrying, old man. Von Valancius and Chorda have always been gunning for each other. One was bound to gain the upper hand sooner or later — everyone understood that."

languages.text: "Endişelenme ihtiyar. Von Valanciuslar ile Chordalar, her daim birbirlerinin zayıf anını kollamıştır. İkisinden biri eninde sonunda üstün gelecekti. Herkes bunun farkındaydı zaten."
languages.original_text: "Oh, quit your worrying, old man. Von Valancius and Chorda have always been gunning for each other. One was bound to gain the upper hand sooner or later — everyone understood that."

traits.locale_text: "Endişelenme ihtiyar. Von Valancius ve Chorda her zaman birbirinin zayıf anını kollamıştır. İkisinden biri eninde sonunda üstün gelecekti. Herkes bunun farkındaydı zaten."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
